title: The Alphabet Game, Part Two: F to K
description: The Alphabet Game story continues ... with Part Two: F to K ...This is the second in a series of four novellas, released monthly. It is not a standalone and has a cliffhanger ending. Stella Mulroney had been getting an education, with lawyer Gabe Gregory teaching her The Alphabet Game, a sexual exploration from A through to Z, so she could infiltrate the sex clubs owned by her stepfather. After the restaurant debacle, Stella now has more to learn. Can Gabe be trusted, or is her stepfather no longer the enemy? Stella hires a private investigator to help her track down her stepsister Isabel, who might hold some of the answers. Or then again, maybe Isabel has secrets of her own ...*** ** ** ***Read all four parts of The Alphabet Game serial: The Alphabet Game, Part One: A to EThe Alphabet Game, Part Two: F to KThe Alphabet Game, Part Three: L to RThe Alphabet Game, Part Four: S to X, Y, Z
author: Andie M. Long
